name: gethardquestion
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool leetcodeapi.
Tool description: The API fetches basic information of a LeetCode profile based on the provided username.
API description: Fetches the number of hard questions solved by a specified user on LeetCode using the RapidAPI service.

username.description: The LeetCode username of the user whose hard question count is to be retrieved.
